english.segment1: It took a lot of patience getting here. To be content is a command. Waiting everyday for answers. Till I finally got a clue. So kut me
english.segment2: It's a little funny when its clear. Why does learning take so long. Seems that I just don't understand. Satisfaction's what I need. So kut me
english.segment3: I want to be kut by you. Pierce my soul
